name: n0g
body:
### About Me ###
I study Computer Engineering and Cultural- and Social Anthropolgy in Vienna. I like to code in C and have a special interests in microcontrollers and network protocols. 
As a regular paranoid geek I'm also interested in IT security and crypto.

### Projects ###
Arcane encrypts your mail. http://github.n0g.at/arcane

### Contact ###
* mail: mf@n0g.at
* xmpp: mf@n0g.at
